edge: Both Rajkummar Rao and Neushrat Bharucha play lead roles in the movie. Initially, they are teachers in the same school and later get married.
Both Rajkummar Rao and Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub are senior PTIs in the same school.
Both Nushrat Bharucha and Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub are teachers in the same school.
Ila Arun is the principal of Rajkummar Rao's former school.
Both Saurabh Shukla and Satish Kaushik are retired lawyers and the fathers of Rajkummar Rao and Naman Jain, respectively.
Both Jatin Sarna and Dimpy are associated with a small snacks shop.
Naman Jain and Baljinder Kaur are the children of Satish Kaushik and Rajkummar Rao, respectively.
